=============================
 BigFloat Unit Tests
=============================
--- BigInt Basic Tests ---
  12345 + 67890 = 80235 [OK]
  12345 * 67890 = 838102050 [OK]
  999999999999999999^2 = 999999999999999998000000000000000001
  [OK]
  100 / 7 = 14 remainder 2
  [OK]
  1 << 100 = 1267650600228229401496703205376
  bit_length = 101
  [OK]

--- BigFloat Arithmetic Tests ---
  3 + 4 = 7.0000000000
  3 * 4 = 12.0000000000
  3 / 4 = 0.75000000000000000000
  1 / 3 = 0.3333333333333333333333333333333333333323

--- BigFloat Math Function Tests ---
  Computing pi...
  pi = 3.14159265358979323846264338327950288419716939937510
  Computing sqrt(2)...
  sqrt(2) = 1.41421356231772473880222865513392857142857142857142
  Computing e...
  e = 2.71828182845904523536028747135266249775724709369995
  exp(1) = 2.71828182845904523536028747135266249775724709369995
  Computing ln(e)...
  ln(e) = 0.99999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999
  Computing sqrt(pi)...
  sqrt(pi) = 1.77245385090551602729816748334114518279754945612238
  Computing Gamma(0.5) = (-0.5)! ...
  Gamma(0.5) = 1.77245385090551602729816748334114518279754945612238
  5! = 120.00000

All tests completed.
